name: Tom Vs Jerry: The Chase Is On!
overview: Developed by Software Creations Ltd. and to be published by Hi Tech Expressions, the game was canceled when Ted Turner bought Hanna-Barbera in 1991. Along the game many other Hanna-Barbera projects got canceled. However, it's also possible that the game was canceled along with many other Hi Tech Expressions projects because of a possible company closure that same year.
